EmailTemplate.name: 07_20_2015 Healthcare Webcast Blast.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Lessons In Maintaining A Healthy Data Center From Healthcare IT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-mary-washington-healthcare?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=HealthCare2015&utm_content=07202015> {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
It’s time to break free from the break-fix cycle in IT operations management. Learn how one leading healthcare provider leveraged VMTurbo’s demand-driven control to do just that, all while saving nearly $200,000.
Join VMTurbo and Mary Washington Healthcare as we discuss challenges faced by healthcare organizations attempting to adhere to regulations while maintaining high-performing and efficient IT operations.
During the webcast, you will learn about:
- Improving application performance with VMTurbo's economic scheduling engine. - Eliminating contention-based VM outages and failures - Using what-if capacity planning to maximize utilization and grow with precision. - How MWHC saw more than $180,000 in savings in just one day through intelligent workload management.
- The VMTurbo Team <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/vmturbo-webcast-mary-washington-healthcare?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=HealthCare2015&utm_content=07202015>
